meta.name: skill-share
meta.title: Skill Share
meta.description: A skill that creates new Claude skills and automatically shares them on Slack using Rube for seamless team collaboration and skill discovery.

original_definition.skill_description: A skill that creates new Claude skills and automatically shares them on Slack using Rube for seamless team collaboration and skill discovery.

actions.name: Parse Skill Request
actions.description: Extract skill name, description, and requirements from user request

actions.name: Create Skill Directory
actions.description: Create properly structured skill directory with SKILL.md, scripts/, references/, assets/

actions.name: Generate SKILL.md
actions.description: Create SKILL.md with YAML frontmatter and standardized documentation sections

actions.name: Write SKILL.md File
actions.description: Write generated SKILL.md content to skill directory

actions.name: Validate Skill Structure
actions.description: Validate SKILL.md format, required fields, naming conventions, and metadata completeness

actions.name: Package Skill
actions.description: Create distributable zip file containing all skill assets and documentation

actions.name: Find Slack Channel
actions.description: Use Rube SLACK_FIND_CHANNELS to discover target channel for skill announcement

actions.name: Post to Slack
actions.description: Use Rube SLACK_POST_MESSAGE_WITH_BLOCKS to share rich formatted skill metadata

directives.name: Skill Created and Shared
directives.description: New Claude skill created with proper structure, validated, packaged, and shared on Slack

directives.name: Skill Structure Knowledge
directives.description: Standard skill directory: SKILL.md (main definition), scripts/ (automation), references/ (documentation), assets/ (media)

directives.name: YAML Frontmatter Schema
directives.description: Required fields: name (hyphen-case), description (concise). Optional: license, version, author

directives.name: Validate Before Package
directives.description: Always run validation before packaging or sharing

directives.name: Rube Integration
directives.description: Uses SLACK_SEND_MESSAGE, SLACK_POST_MESSAGE_WITH_BLOCKS, SLACK_FIND_CHANNELS via Rube

execution_paths.condition: User requests skill creation with Slack sharing
execution_paths.expected_outcome: Skill created, validated, packaged, and announced on Slack

execution_paths.condition: User requests skill creation without Slack (or Slack unavailable)
execution_paths.expected_outcome: Skill created, validated, and packaged locally
